attributes.action: Force Banks To Provide Every UK Tax Payer With A Free Bank Account, Regardless Of Credit History
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the government to force UK banks to provide every uk taxpayer a free basic bank account regardless of their credit history as a basic bank account offers no borrowing facilities this would be in no danger of costing the bank money and not allowing the bank to charge the account holder any either.
